mapper.select: select * from sys_role r,sys_user_role ur where r.id=ur.rid and ur.uid=#{id}

select u.id, u.nickname, u.phone,u.wechat,u.qq, u.email, u.activated, u.locked, u.username,u.password, u.avatar,u.last_login_at, u.last_login_ip,u.home_path,u.created_at,u.updated_at,r.`id` as rid,r.`name` as rname,r.`name_zh` as rname_zh, d.name as dname,d.`id` as did from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.`id`=ur.`uid` left join sys_role r on ur.`rid`=r.`id` left join sys_user_dept ud on u.`id`=ud.`uid` left join sys_dept d on d.`id`=ud.`did` where u.username = #{username}

select u.id, u.nickname, u.phone,u.wechat,u.qq, u.email, u.activated, u.locked, u.username,u.password, u.avatar,u.last_login_at, u.last_login_ip,u.home_path,u.created_at,u.updated_at,r.`id` as rid,r.`name` as rname,r.`name_zh` as rname_zh, d.name as dname,d.`id` as did from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.`id`=ur.`uid` left join sys_role r on ur.`rid`=r.`id` left join sys_user_dept ud on u.`id`=ud.`uid` left join sys_dept d on d.`id`=ud.`did` where u.id = #{uid}
